products.name: Gardenia Elisa Top
products.brandedName: Carolina K. Gardenia Elisa Top
products.description: Argentinian musician and designer Carolina Kleinman created her namesake brand, Carolina K, in 2002. Her collection is eclectic and draws inspiration from her travels in Mexico, Peru, and Bolivia. We are loving the romance of the Gardenia Elisa Top. This feminine blouse features half-length puff sleeves, a front keyhole with a self-tie closure, and navy embroidery detailing throughout. Wear for a casual date night with dark wash denim and ballet flats, or pair with the matching Gardenia Roma Shorts and sandals! Spread collar Front keyhole with self-tie closure Half-length puff sleeves with thick cuffs Front button placket Navy embroidery detailing Straight scalloped hem Slightly cropped body Material: 100% Cotton Care: Hand wash cold, hang to dry

products.unbrandedName: Hyacinth House White Front Zip Denim Mini Dress
products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. This mod mini is what your closet needs this season! Featuring a zip front, polo collar, on-trend puff sleeves, and a feminine A-line silhouette constructed out of a thick denim-like fabric, the White Denim Mini Dress is the perfect choice for desk-to-drinks! The neutral canvas makes styling a breeze - pair with knee high boots and ladylike pearl accessories for day, strappy sandals for happy hour, or sneakers for carpool drop off! The ultimate do-it-all mini! Front zipper Polo collar A-Line silhouette Puff sleeves Denim-like fabric Material: 97% Cotton, 3% Spandex Care: Hand wash cold, hang to dry

products.name: Cropped Ribbed Tank
products.brandedName: RE/DONE Cropped Ribbed Tank
products.description: Cropped Ribbed Tank Cropped Ribbed Tank 100% cotton. Made in USA. Machine wash. Ribbed jersey fabric. REDR-WS259. R24-02WCRRBTK. Iconic. Responsible. Individual. Launched in Los Angeles in 2014 by industry veterans Sean Barron and Jamie Mazur, RE/DONE started with a simple idea of taking the old and making it new again. This is present in everything RE/DONE does from upcycling vintage Levi's to reimagining vintage Hanes tees with recycled fabric. Today, they continue to honor their exclusive heritage partnerships, while expanding their offering to also include recycled knits, upcycled ready to wear, and sneakers handmade in Italy by expert artisans. As of 2020, RE/DONE has upcycled nearly 100,000 pairs of vintage Levis.

products.name: The North Face Women's Recon (Dark Cornflower Dark Heather) Backpack Bags
products.brandedName: The North Face Women's Recon (Dark Cornflower Dark Heather) Backpack Bags
products.unbrandedName: Women's Recon (Dark Cornflower Dark Heather) Backpack Bags
products.description: The Recon by The North Face has the durability and space for all of your utilities and gear. Women-specific fit. Large main compartment with padded laptop sleeve and hydration clip/port-fits most 16 laptops. FlexVent injection-molded shoulder straps with additional PE foam for added comfort. Large front mesh pocket for convenient storage. Comfortable, padded airmesh back panel with Spine Channel and PE sheet for extra back support. Padded, winged, stowable hipbelt. FlexVent injection-molded shoulder straps with additional PE foam. Comfortable padded Chemise back panel with Spine Channel and PE sheet for extra back support. Secondary compartment with organization. Laminated back panel with breathable mesh. Large, front mesh drop pocket. Small stash pocket with water resistant fabric and zipper closure. Small front panel stash pocket. Front compartment organizer will keep your items in order. Mesh side water bottle pocket. Reflective material allover. Dual mesh side water bottle pockets keeps your water close and handy. Full top zipper closure for safe storage. Tuck away hip belt. Endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association (ACA). Specifications: Average weight - 2 lbs 6 oz / 1080 g. Fabric - 420D nylon, 1680D ballistics nylon. Volume - 1710 cu in / 28 L. Dimensions - 19 x 13 x 11 in. Imported Measurements: Bottom Width: 13 in Depth: 11 in Height: 18 1 2 in Strap Length: 33 1 2 in Strap Drop: 14 in Weight: 2 lbs 5 oz
